detailed_design.description: Refactor ModelRouter to query Ollama API (/api/tags) for available models. Map detected models to intents based on capabilities (e.g., 'coding' -> codellama, 'roleplay' -> hermes). Fallback to safe defaults if preferred models are missing.

user_stories.story: As a user, I want the system to automatically detect which LLMs I have installed so that I don't have to manually configure string names.
As a developer, I want the system to gracefully handle missing models by falling back to a standard default (like llama3) so the system doesn't crash.
